body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.39 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for registry symbolic links.
Many MSI fixes.
Build process improvements.
MSXML cleanups and fixes.
A number of MSHTML improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
